name: Infiniqi+Spark
title: Infiniqi Spark
description: A versatile electric skateboard for everyone. This technical board features a double hub motor, long endurance and great speed for your everyday commute.&nbsp;<div><br></div><div>Features:</div><div><ul><li>Max speed: 35 km/h (21 miles/h).</li><li>Max milage: 25 km (15 miles).</li><li>Wireless controller and charger included.</li><li>Easy to control.</li><li>Available with black, red or orange wheels.</li></ul></div>
